entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:46 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 06:46 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
